transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Hello.
Customer: Ha mam ye Sapna ji baat kar rahi hai Baba glass solution se.
Executive: Ji ji Patna se baat kar rahi hai Sapna ji good evening main Sanjay baat kar raha hun India Mart Noida head office branch se.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Mam ye profile aapka India Mart pe meri team hi dekhti hai backend se.
Customer: Kya hua hai?
Executive: Ye jo profile hai aapka India Mart pe ye package se meri team hi dekhti hai Noida se theek hai.
Executive: Aur ispe abhi aapka na call aa raha tha jisme main dekh pa raha hun kuch OTP ke regarding aapko issue aa raha hai right?
Customer: Ha OTP nahi matlab jo register jo mobile number hai na usse OTP nahi ja pa raha.
Executive: Aapka jo main number hai primary number sir ka.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Shailok Aggarwal sir ka right isme is number pe OTP nahi ja raha aap ye kehna chah rahe hai isme?
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Abhi main try ki thi isse nahi ja pa raha agar usme option kuch hai dekhiye na mail ka bhi agar option to mujhe bataye login mujhe karna hai na.
Executive: Line pe rahiye main dekh raha hun hold down.
Executive: Ye fir to ye login kaise ho raha hai matlab panel jo hai India Mart ka ye already login hai ya login bhi nahi hai aapka?
Customer: Login hi nahi hai matlab pichle to India Mart ka panel login nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Line pe rahiye check kar raha hun.
Customer: Login hi to karna chah rahe hai to wo nahi ho pa raha na.
Executive: Accha accha accha matlab OTP nahi ja raha primary number pe jis wajah se aap login nahi kar pa rahe correct?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sapna mam hello aawaz aa rahi hai aapko meri?
Customer: Ha ha ji aa rahi hai.
Executive: Agar login ka issue aa raha hai primary number pe login nahi ja raha hai jitna main dekh pa raha hun ek bar fir main iske andar apni jo technical team hai theek hai inse ek bar main check karaunga aawaz aa rahi hai aapko meri?
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Main keh raha hun agar login ka aapko issue aa raha hai login nahi kar pa rahe because of OTP number nahi aa raha aapke paas ispe primary number pe to ek bar main apni jo technical team hai isko main check kara raha hun but isko check karane ke andar approximately 24 hours ka time lagega mota mota.
Customer: Koi baat nahi sir aap kal tak mujhe iska kar dijiye.
Executive: Ha main pehle hi bata deta hun agar aap kahe ki sir same time pe result karao kyuki abhi aap kal tak mujhe iska karwa dijiye theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai ek cheez aur mujhe bataye mam apart from this ye to main check kara hi raha hun aapka issue sath ke sath me mam aapke yahan par na profile pe main dekh pa raha hun meri team ke andar me jaisa aap jante bhi honge Reena Pandey se aapki baat bhi hui thi theek hai 30 October ko Reena theek hai aur ispe mam aapko ek ye update kara tha jo aapki buyers ki call hai wo kafi had tak miss ho ja rahi hai right?
Customer: Kya kya cheez ka sir main samajh nahi pa rahi hun.
Executive: Main keh raha hun aapki baat hui thi hamare staff se Reena Pandey 30 October ko yaad hai aapko madam to phone bhi aaya tha.
Customer: Pata nahi sir hui hongi sir yaad nahi mujhe bataye to ispe ispe na hum jo India Mart buyers ki call aapke paas ja rahi hai ye kafi had tak miss ho ja rahi hai jis wajah se aapki jo visibility hai India Mart ke andar wo dheere dheere karke suppress ho rahi hai theek hai to ispe kya issue aa raha hai ye mujhe samajhna padega wapas ke andar.
Customer: Ha theek hai ek bar mujhe dekh ke confirm bataye.
Executive: Nahi nahi main ye bolna chah raha hun jo India Mart buyers ki call aapke paas aa rahi hai na jo buyers call karte hai ha ha India Mart ka call to aa raha hai wo ratio down ja raha hai aapka ab last month pe October month pe 20 call aayi thi aapke paas 20 me se 15 call miss ho gayi mam iske andar aapki na India Mart ka aapne dekha hoga inquiry ka graph down ja raha hai matlab inquiry kar rahi hai valid aapki suppress ho gayi hai to koi reason mam iske andar matlab jo buyers ke call aate hai wo fir kyu nahi hote hai?
Customer: Hota hai ki non official time ka bhi kabhi kabhi call aa jati hai lekin maximum dekhiye aapka jo ye number hai aapka jo ye number hai is number pe non official calling setting aapne hata ke rakhi hai theek hai but jo sir ke number hai na primary number uspe office and non office dono startup hai dono option hai dono option hai dekhiye dono option sir ne on karke rakhe hai but aapne off karke rakha hai apne number pe sir ne kara hoga na down abhi ye login hoga na to main bhi kar dungi sir on ha to is wajah se mam aapke na jo buyers aa rahe hai wo call miss ho rahi hai dusra ek cheez aur update karna chahunga aapko aapke jo catalog ka quality score hai mam ye bhi bahut kam hai iske regarding aap please kal ek bar na meri team se meeting karna online meeting video meeting jiske andar kuch points aise hai mam jo discuss karna mandatory hai jo aapki profile score kam kar rahe hai listing kam kar rahe hai wo theek hai lekin login to hona chahiye na OTP nahi rahega aise man call nahi aayega wo to main theek hai maine kaha hai na wo issue main resolve kara dunga aapka fir meri team aapko approach karegi for a video meeting chaliye theek hai to wo ek bar aap please join karke isko complete karana profile ko theek hai wo issue main aapko resolve karwa raha hun theek hai theek hai sir okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to login to IndiaMART panel.

- OTP not received on registered mobile number.

- Buyer calls are being missed.

- Catalog quality score is low.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve OTP issue.

- Executive informed about missed buyer calls.

- Executive suggested a video meeting for catalog quality.



Next Steps: 

- Technical team will check the OTP issue.

- Customer to attend a video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- login issue, otp, buyer calls, catalog, profile
